about_the_game:
Well to Hell is a short first-person horror game about an urban explorer who gets trapped at the bottom of a well. To escape, you'll have to navigate around, find places to hide and look for tools to open different areas. Find a way out before it finds you...

Summary:

Full of exploration and curiosity. Till now, you've explored the deepest depths, the tallest structures, and forgotten locations that once thrived. We set out to explore a creepy abandoned property not far from home. As you lurk around, you come across an old looking well, totally out of commision. You contemplate on scaling down to further explore. Why not?

content_descriptors.notes: Includes depictions of blood, violent acts and corpses. A large portion of the game will show or relate to these depictions.

name: Well to Hell Demo
short_description: A short first-person horror game where you play as an urban explorer trapped at the bottom of a well. Find a way out before it finds you.
